ygData.subject: Glowing Silk Gloves (SPOILER w/ Space)
ygData.msgSnippet: In case any bards out there are also tailors like me the recipe for the Glowing Silk gloves has been discovered.  And before Verant chaned the Book of Wu to
ygData.messageBody:
In case any bards out there are also tailors like me the recipe for the
Glowing Silk gloves has been discovered. And before Verant chaned the Book
of Wu to make it easier to figure out! They are AC4 and unfortunately as
feared Monk only. Oh well, I guess I should at least be relieved that I
enjoy merchanting and that they aren't No Drop. Maybe someday I'll be able
to tailor something actually worth my wearing again.

Kitasi tailor of E'ci

Glowing Silk Gloves:
1 Glove Pattern
1 Silk Swatch
4 Heady Kiola
1 Greater Lightstone
1 Vial of Viscous Mana

AC 4
Monk Only
Casts light as Greater Lightstone
